static member OnlineGradientDescent : Microsoft.ML.RegressionContext.RegressionTrainers * Microsoft.ML.StaticPipe.Scalar<single> * Microsoft.ML.StaticPipe.Vector<single> * Microsoft.ML.StaticPipe.Scalar<single> * Microsoft.ML.Runtime.IRegressionLoss * single * bool * single * int * Action<Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Learners.LinearRegressionPredictor> -> Microsoft.ML.StaticPipe.Scalar<single>
MemberSignature.Usage: Microsoft.ML.StaticPipe.RegressionTrainers.OnlineGradientDescent (ctx, label, features, weights, lossFunction, learningRate, decreaseLearningRate, l2RegularizerWeight, numIterations, onFit)

Docs.param: The custom loss. Defaults to if not provided.
Decrease learning rate as iterations progress.
Number of training iterations through the data.

A delegate that is called every time the method is called on the instance created out of this. This delegate will receive the linear model that was trained, as well as the calibrator on top of that model. Note that this action cannot change the result in any way; it is only a way for the caller to be informed about what was learnt.
Docs.summary: Predict a target using a linear regression model trained with the trainer.
Docs.returns: The set of output columns including in order the predicted binary classification score (which will range from negative to positive infinity), and the predicted label.

Docs.param: Memory size for . Lower=faster, less accurate.

A delegate that is called every time the method is called on the instance created out of this. This delegate will receive the linear model that was trained. Note that this action cannot change the result in any way; it is only a way for the caller to be informed about what was learnt.
Docs.summary: Predict a target using a linear regression model trained with the trainer.
